package.name: guymager-code
package.patch: cd ${PKGNAME}/tags/guymager-0.8.7/ sed -i 's%/usr/local/lib/libewf\.a%/usr/compat.old/lib/libewf.a%g' guymager.pro sed -i '/INCLUDEPATH += \/usr\/include\/libguytools2/a INCLUDEPATH += \/usr\/compat.old\/include' guymager.pro
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}/tags/guymager-0.8.7/ qmake-qt5 make -j4 lrelease-qt5 guymager.pro echo '===> Files found:' ls -lah
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}/tags/guymager-0.8.7/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin install -m 0755 guymager ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/guymager install -m 0644 guymager.cfg ${TGTDIR}/etc/guymager mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons install -m 0644 guymager_128.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications install -m 0644 guymager.desktop ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications sed -i 's/System/CB-Rescue/g' ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/guymager.desktop sed -i 's%gksu guymager%sudo /usr/bin/guymager%g' ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/guymager.desktop
